mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Products(productID, categoryID, supplierID, pName, origin, description, volume, alcoholContent, price) VALUES(product_seq.nextval, #{categoryID}, #{supplierID}, #{pName}, #{origin}, #{description}, #{volume}, #{alcoholContent}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT productID, categoryID, supplierID, origin, pName, description, volume, alcoholContent, price, imageFile, imageFileSaved, thumb, sizes, pcnt, recom FROM Products ORDER BY productID DESC

SELECT productID, categoryID, supplierID, origin, pName, description, volume, alcoholContent, price, imageFile, imageFileSaved, thumb, sizes, pcnt, recom FROM Products WHERE categoryID BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY productID DESC

SELECT productID, categoryID, supplierID, origin, pName, description, volume, alcoholContent, price, imageFile, imageFileSaved, thumb, sizes, pcnt, recom FROM Products
WHERE categoryID=#{categoryID}
WHERE categoryID=#{categoryID} AND (UPPER(pName) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(description) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(word) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
ORDER BY productID DESC
